mapper.select: SELECT yxmc FROM yxbm WHERE yxbm = (SELECT yxbm FROM users WHERE gh = #{gh})
SELECT gh,uname FROM users WHERE yxbm = (SELECT yxbm FROM users WHERE gh = #{gh})
SELECT zwbm,edgzl FROM jbxx WHERE gh = #{gh}
SELECT zwmc FROM zwbm WHERE zwbm = #{zwbm}

SELECT SUM(edgzl + jxgzl + bkssjjx.gzl + zlgc.gzl + jxcg.gzl + hxxm.gzl + zxxm.gzl + jc.gzl + jxgg.gzl + zdxsjs.gzl + jsjs.gzl + zdxslw.gzl + ddgzl + qtgzl) AS "sumgzl" FROM jbxx,bksktjx,bkssjjx,zlgc,jxcg,hxxm,zxxm,jc,jxgg,zdxsjs,jsjs,zdxslw,qtjxgz WHERE jbxx.gh = bksktjx.gh = bkssjjx .gh = zlgc.gh = jxcg.gh = hxxm .gh = zxxm.gh = jc.gh = jxgg.gh = zdxsjs.gh = jsjs.gh = zdxslw.gh = qtjxgz.gh = #{gh}

SELECT SUM(yjsktjx.gzl + jbjsyxkjs.gzl + rcgzl + yjssjjx.gzl + yjsjyxm.gzl + yjshxxm.gzl + zdsslw.gzl + yjsqtjx.gzl) AS "sumgzl" FROM yjsktjx,jbjsyxkjs,yjssjjx,yjsjyxm,yjshxxm,zdsslw,yjsqtjx WHERE yjsktjx.gh = jbjsyxkjs.gh = yjssjjx.gh = yjsjyxm.gh = yjshxxm.gh = zdsslw.gh = yjsqtjx.gh = #{gh}
SELECT tjzt,shzt from tjzt WHERE gh = #{gh}
